tool_description: Check the validity of any phone number and email address
name: Phone and Email validator
title: Phone and Email validator

api_list.name: getEmailValidity
api_list.description: Will check the validity of an email and return a Boolean. Specific aspects of the email can be used to check its validity

optional_parameters.name: dns
optional_parameters.description: Will compare the email to DNS mx-records. Default is true

optional_parameters.name: blacklist
optional_parameters.description: Will verify if the email is in the blacklist of domains  from DadouData. Default is true

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Will check if the format of the email is correct. Defaults to true

optional_parameters.name: smtp
optional_parameters.description: Will actually check if the email is true by establishing an  SMTP conversation. Default is true

api_list.name: getPhoneDetails
api_list.description: Enter phone number to check its validity and obtain details if its real. If the country code is not specified. The location of request's ip address is considered.  If the country prefix is specified directly in the phone number, country code is not required.
